source.title: CLaRa: Bridging Retrieval and Generation with Continuous Latent Reasoning

claim: CLaRa is QA-RAG over continuous tuples instead of raw text; document compressor creates QA memory lattice, query reasoner performs QA state evolution

concepts.memory_tokens: aggregated QA cells encoding tuple spectrum

Query state evolves via resonance walk
